name: Zombie Fortress for the iPhone - Fight back the zombie horde!
blurb: Using an array of weapons you collect or build, defend survivors who make their way to your base through a zombie horde in this game for the iPhone.

rewards.reward: PERSONAL GLORY \u2013- For a minimum pledge of one dollar your name will go\u2026 somewhere. Either on a thank you screen in the game, or on the game\u2019s website (Also coming soon). I haven't figured it out yet, but it will be one of those places, and that\u2019s pretty cool. So cool that you would probably feel pretty bad about only spending a single dollar on such an honor (not that I\u2019d turn down your dollar.)
CONGRATULATIONS ON SURVIVING THE ZOMBIE PLAGUE -- For a minimum pledge of ten dollars I\u2019ll get you a copy of the game once it\u2019s out. You will also receive PERSONAL GLORY!

WATCH OUT FOR THE LITTLE ONES -- For a minimum pledge of twenty-five dollars I'll send you a MiniZom keychain. These little guys are hand sewn mini versions of the plush zombie, perfect for dangling from your keys, your rear-view mirror, or just about any other dangle source. I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

THEY CAN GET IN THROUGH THE MAIL SLOT! -- For a minimum pledge of thirty dollars, I will send you a set of 5 paper zombies! These zombies will be professionally printed (in color!) on nice cardstock and mailed to you for you to cut out, fold, and glue together to have your very own paper zombie mini hoard! I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

SNACKS FOR THE TRIP \u2013- For a minimum pledge of forty dollars I will send you the set of 5 paper zombies (see above), AND a set of 5 paper people! Some of these people will probably be dead, and partially eaten, so that should be fun\u2026 I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

ZOMBIE PRIDE -\u2013 For a minimum pledge of fifty dollars you can show your zombie pride with our lovely zombie T-shirt. It will say to the world, \u201cHey, World, I feel a way about zombies.\u201d And you choose the size! Small, medium, large, extra large, all the best sizes, as long as it\u2019s one of those. I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

WE'RE DIFFERENT! -- For a minimum pledge of fifty-five dollars I\u2019ll send you the set of 5 paper people (see above) and the set of 5 paper zombies (see higher above) AND a set of 5 variants of figures from the first two sets! Cool! Neat! Rare! (Unless everyone goes for this pledge level, then they are just cool and neat.) I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

ZOMBIES HAVE NEVER BEEN SO SOFT\u2026 \u2013 For a minimum pledge of seventy dollars I will send you a hand sewn, plush zombie. These zombies have a secret, magnetic, feature! Perfect for you AND your zombie loving loved ones! (That\u2019s right; find a way to pledge twice!) I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

YOU KNOW WHAT I\u2019D REALLY LIKE TO KILL A ZOMBIE WITH? -- At one time or another I\u2019m sure we\u2019ve all thought, \u201cThe crowbar is the obvious choice for killing zombies in close quarters, but for long range what we really need some is kind of crowbar gun!\u201d Do you have a really great/crazy idea for a zombie-killing weapon? Well now\u2019s your chance to see that idea in action! For a minimum bid of seventy-five dollars you can design a weapon for the game. Your weapon will be released in a free weapon pack or as part of a game update. Don\u2019t choose crowbar gun though, because I already called it. The weapon will have to work for the game, so if you think up something that we can\u2019t make work, I\u2019ll work with you to tweak it so that it will. Also, let\u2019s keep it clean, OK? I can\u2019t personally think of an obscene way to kill a zombie, but I\u2019m also not trying. I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

ZOMBIE DUO\u2026 \u2013 For a minimum pledge of ninety dollars I will send you a hand sewn, plush zombie and the zombie keychain. The plush zombie has a secret, magnetic, feature!  I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

ZOMBIE HOARD \u2013 For a minimum pledge of one hundred and fifty dollars I will send you the paper zombies, the paper people, the variant paper figures, AND the plush zombie! With that many zombies hanging around your house, my friend, there is very little chance of your survival. I will also get you a copy of the game, and PERSONAL GLORY!

ZOMBIES, THE T-SHIRT, AND EVERYTHING \u2013 For a minimum pledge of two hundred and fifty dollars you get it all. I will send you the set of 5 paper zombies, the set of 5 paper people, the set of 5 paper variants, the zombie T-shirt, the plush zombie, you can make a weapon for the game, and I will get you a copy of the game, AND PERSONAL GLORY!

HEAD SHOT \u2013 Hey, crazy rich people (and crazy, rich people) cruising Kickstarter, looking to blow someone\u2019s mind by dumping a huge wad of cash on them. I know you\u2019re out there\u2026 Pick me. You won\u2019t get anything more than the two hundred and fifty dollar guy, but who cares?!?! You\u2019re RICH! (And possibly crazy?)
